markdownRemark.html:
Communicate clearly to help others put themselves in the story.

Build credibility by showcase work and demonstrating value.

Images to show best of work. Quotes of great experience from clients. Numbers to show success. Words to describe scenario. Logos to leverage authority.

frontmatter.description: Communicate clearly to help others put themselves in the story.
frontmatter.title: Build credibility by showcasing work and demonstrating value
